title: HTML Element
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The <html> tag represents the root of an HTML document.

usageExamples.title: HTML5 Skeleton
usageExamples.description: The standard structure of an HTML5 document.
usageExamples.code:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
  <title>My HTML5 Document</title>
</head>
<body>

</body>
</html>
